message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good chunk, but I want a bit more for myself
That's a bit too skewed towards you, Bob! I'll wait for a fairer deal.
A slight adjustment to my previous offer, hoping you'll see it my way this time!
I'll take a bigger share, but I'll still give you something
That's getting too one-sided, Bob! I'm not willing to give up that much.
A compromise, Bob! Let's meet in the middle this time.
I'm getting desperate, but I'll still give you a small share
That's not even close to fair, Bob! I'm not going to get taken advantage of like this.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I need a better deal for myself now.
I'm getting close to taking all the money, but I'll give you a tiny bit
No way, Bob! You're getting too greedy! I'm not giving up that much.
I'm making one last push for a fair deal, Bob. Let's split it 60/40.
I'm taking what I can get, Alice, but don't expect much
That's outrageous, Bob! You're not even offering me a fair fraction of the remaining money. I'm not accepting this insult.
This is my last chance, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a decent share for myself.
I'm taking almost everything, Alice. You're getting a tiny fraction
NO WAY, BOB! I'd rather take nothing than accept this laughable offer. You're not getting away with this!
